name: LetsGoMo
tag_list: iphone-application-development, ipad-application-development, blackberry-development, html5-development, android-development, mobile-enterprise-solutions
overview:
Letgomo helps its clients in actively engaging with 1.5 billion customers who access information and services using their mobile devices. Letsgomo does that by creating their mobile strategy which often involves creating smartphone (iPhone, iPad, Android, Blackberry) applications and mobile websites(HTML5, WAP).

Smartphone Apps: LetsGoMo creates successful applications by combining understanding of the complete smartphone ecosystem , industry knowledge and technical expertise in different mobile platforms. Letsgomo team guides their customers in the entire process from conceptualizing the application, technology and platform choice, UI Design, Development, Testing, and Application Marketing. For more details, please visit at http://letsgomo.com/smartphone-applications-development/

Mobile Websites: Mobile devices are different from desktops in a lot of ways. Therefore a website that is excellent for desktop audience might not cut it for mobile audience. Letsgomo provides complete solutions from building mobile strategy to implementation and hosting. Customers benefit from expertise in building HTML5 Mobile Websites and Applications and WAP Mobile Websites. For more details, please visit at http://letsgomo.com/mobile-website-design/
